lead_paragraph: A phrase appearing on some labels was seen as tone-deaf to the dangers of excessive alcohol use and particularly to alcohol’s role in some cases of date rape.

headline.print_headline: Bud Light Label Draws Ire on Social Media
headline.main: Bud Light Withdraws Slogan After It Draws Ire Online

snippet: A phrase appearing on some labels was seen as tone-deaf to the dangers of excessive alcohol use and particularly to alcohol’s role in some cases of date rape.
abstract: Anheuser-Bush InBev incurs widespread ire from women after placing controversial label on some of its Bud Light bottles; language, which suggests beer helps remove word 'no' from a drinker's vocabulary, is seen as deeply insensitive in light of public outcry over campus rape.
